Contact information

For communication I have a strong preference for e-mail, which I check quite regularly (except when I'm on vacation; then I usually stay away from tech). Feel free to drop me a line at my address, gdkaracha@gmail.com!

Currently I live in Haarlem, the Netherlands; for the timezone see here.
